entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:32 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
